text:
kShaqtraM ~MviqSvatO# dhArayEqdaM || 
bRuqhat sAma# kShatraqBRud-vRuqddha vRu#ShNiyaM triqShTuBauja#H SuBiqta muqgravI#raM | 
indraq stOmE#na pa~jcadaqSEnaq maddhya#miqdaM ~MvAtE#naq saga#rENa rakSha || 
prAcI# diqSA(gm) saqhaya#SAq yaSa#svatIq viSvE# dEvAH prAqvRuShA &hnAq(gm)q suva#rvatI | 
iqdaM kShaqtraM duqShTara#maqstvOjO &nA#dhRuShTa(gm) sahaqsriyaq(gm)q saha#svat || 
vaiqrUqpE sAma#nniqha tacCa#kEmaq jaga#tyainaM ~MviqkShvA vE#SayAmaH | 
viSvE# dEvAH saptadaqSEnaq - [  ] 34
